entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mayo Airport 11:47 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -25.1°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Occasional drifting snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
